insight: Identify the most popular products that cost more than 50
actionable_business_value: This will help in understanding customer preferences and can be used to drive marketing strategies.
sql: SELECT product_id, COUNT(*) as order_count FROM orders JOIN products ON orders.product_id = products.product_id WHERE products.price > 50 GROUP BY product_id ORDER BY order_count DESC LIMIT 10

insight: Find out the suppliers who supply products that cost more than 50
actionable_business_value: This can help in negotiating better deals with these suppliers or identifying alternative suppliers for cost reduction.
sql: SELECT DISTINCT supplier_id FROM supplier_products JOIN products ON supplier_products.product_id = products.product_id WHERE products.price > 50

insight: Identify the categories of products that cost more than 50
actionable_business_value: This can help in understanding which categories are more profitable and can guide inventory management decisions.
sql: SELECT DISTINCT category_id FROM products WHERE price > 50
